successes.title: The Art of Brom
successes.description: This Brom hardcover art book will be the largest, most comprehensive retrospective ever published on this renowned dark fantasy artist.

Pledges.description: ADVANCE TRADE EDITION: This 208 page hardcover art book will be shipped with an 8 x 10 inch signed art print exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. Your name will be listed in a special thank you page of the book. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

PUBLISHER FANTASY COVER EDITION: This 224 page hardcover art book will be shipped with an 8 x 10 inch signed art print exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. Includes an extra 16-pages not found in the trade edition. Your name will be listed in a special thank you page of the book. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

PUBLISHER NUDE COVER EDITION: This 224 page hardcover art book will be shipped with an 8 x 10 inch signed art print exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. Includes an extra 16-pages not found in the trade edition. Your name will be listed in a special thank you page of the book. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

PUBLISHER FANTASY COVER EDITION WITH SKETCHBOOK: Includes the “Publisher Fantasy Cover Edition” goodies, plus an 5.5 x 8.5 inch 16-page Brom Sketchbook which is not available through other retail outlets. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

PUBLISHER NUDE COVER EDITION WITH SKETCHBOOK: Includes the “Publisher Nude Cover Edition” goodies, plus an 5.5 x 8.5 inch 16-page Brom Sketchbook which is not available through other retail outlets. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

SIGNED PUBLISHER FANTASY COVER EDITION WITH SIGNED SKETCHBOOK: Includes the “Publisher Fantasy Cover Edition with Sketchbook” offerings, plus the two books come signed, and can be personalized upon request. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

SIGNED PUBLISHER NUDE COVER EDITION WITH SIGNED SKETCHBOOK: Includes the “Publisher Nude Cover Edition with Sketchbook” offerings, plus the two books come signed, and can be personalized upon request. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

DELUXE EDITION WITH SIGNED SKETCHBOOK: Signed 225 page deluxe slipcase edition limited to 500 copies. Includes a special signature page bound-in with an additional image and an extra 16-pages not found in the trade edition. Your name will be listed in a special thank you page of the book. Also included is the 5.5 x 8.5 inch 16 page signed Brom Sketchbook and the signed 8 x 10 inch art print exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

DELUXE EDITION WITH SIGNED SKETCHBOOK 2: Signed and numbered 225 page deluxe slipcase edition limited to 500 copies. Includes a special signature page bound-in with an additional image and an extra 16-pages not found in the trade edition. Your name will be listed in a special thank you page of the book. Also included is the 5.5 x 8.5 inch 16 page signed Brom Sketchbook and the signed 8 x 10 inch art print exclusive to Kickstarter supporters. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

DELUXE EDITION WITH SKETCH & SIGNED SKETCHBOOK OPTION: Includes the “Deluxe Edition with Signed Sketchbook” goodies, plus a simple iconic original sketch by Brom in book. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

ARTIST COMBINATION PACKAGE: Includes the “Deluxe Edition with Sketch & Signed Sketchbook.” Plus, a signed Brom paint brush, an exclusive signed and numbered giclee of trade cover art only available through Kickstarter, which is hand proofed by Brom and limited to 35 and a copy of the Publisher Edition with the nude cover. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

ARTIST COMBINATION PACKAGE 2: Includes the "Deluxe Edition with Sketch & Signed Sketchbook" goodies." Plus, a signed palette (globs of paint mixed up on paper palette--as seen in video) and signed brush (both used by Brom to paint with), an exclusive signed and numbered giclee (12 x 16") of Fantasy cover art available only through Kickstarter, which is hand proofed by Brom and limited to 31 and a signed copy of the Publisher Edition with the Fantasy cover. (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

ARTIST ZOMBIE PORTRAIT PACKAGE: Same as “Artist Combination Package,” plus an 11 x 14 inch portrait of you, or a person of your choice, painted in oil as a zombie by Brom (paintings will be published in all versions of the book). (International friends please add extra for shipping. Canada is $34.00 and all other International destinations are $48.00.)

DINNER WITH THE DEVIL AND ORIGINAL OIL PAINTING PACKAGE: Everything offered in the "Artist Combination Package 2", plus the original 18 x 30" oil painting created for the cover of the nude edition, plus a (11 x 14") portrait of yourself or a person of your choice painted in oil as a Creature of the Night (painting will be published in all versions of the book), signed remarked artist proof of the (12 x 16") giclee print of the Fantasy cover art, all three versions of the books signed, and an invitation for you and a friend to join Brom for dinner at his studio in Seattle or in any city Brom is traveling to during the next year (contributor would be responsible for their own travel arrangements).
